attributes.action: Sack Gordon Brown and get somebody useful in charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This a petition to get gordon brown sacked. The NHS is in tatters, the pension scheme is a joke and with the latest news that details of 25 million Uk citizens has been lost, it is time for Gordon Brown to give up and hand it over to somebody more useful.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
